title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
content: Up for auction is #19 of 21 Silver Satoshi Mood Masks - It is still sealed in original packaging (even original shipping box from clay cast) - so the only pics (of it unwrapped) exist on verisart.comhttps://verisart.com/works/clay-cast-x-lucho-poletti-58e6f135-27c8-4fda-bab3-29c1e4cd27a4(image from verisart.com - actual image of piece)Piece is loaded with 0.0021BTC and is 4.1 oz of .999 Fine Silverhttps://mempool.space/address/3KfUp2LwrR2EXYU44BwXYmvxGGU4pBoG13below are pics of items still in original packaging:1. mask and box2. certificate3. close up of certificate showing 19/214. Lucho Poletti Keychain5. Hand signed card from Clay CastYou can see thread here for 5 masks that went for auction last year: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5371872.0Starting bid 0.0000 BTCMinimum Bid Increments: .0001 BTC (please limit to 4 decimal places)End Time: 12/18/2022 3pm ESTSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.
